about_the_game:
Guide Goldo, a lost goblin, in this short, surreal stealth adventure: sneak past hostile adventurers, uncover bizarre treasures, and unravel the dungeon's dark mystery!

  • SNEAK AROUND - Use cover and tunnels to avoid gold-thirsty adventurers. Carefully time each move to stay hidden.

  • DISCOVER BIZARRE TREASURES - Explore for treasures left behind by the dungeon’s enigmatic boss. Every discovery brings you closer to understanding its true nature. All that glitters is Gold.

  • EXPLORE A SURREAL WORLD - Journey through the Golden Nexus, a bizarre and oneiric dungeon where reality bends. Is this place a dream or a nightmare?
